name: Kids Learn
description:
Kids Learn is amazing useful educational game for everyone. Get ready for educational tour.

Features
-Easy & Interactive way to Learn Alphabets & Numbers for Kids.
-In this game you can
(a) Speak & Learn (ABC & 123)
(b) Match the Alphabet
(c) Picture Matching
(d) Letter & Number Quiz
(e) Number Counting (1-100)
(f) Number Puzzle
(g) Alphanumeric
(h) Identifying Numbers
-Fully tested on Windows 7 & Above.
-Demo Version gives access to Limited Features. Buy Full Version to Unlock all the Features.
